trans-unit.source: Handles the XML elements used to configure XML serialization.
trans-unit.target: Gère les éléments XML utilisés pour configurer la sérialisation XML.

trans-unit.source: This class is used to handle the [<system.xml.serialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-xml-serialization-element.md).
trans-unit.target: Cette classe est utilisée pour gérer les [ <system.xml.serialization> élément](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-xml-serialization-element.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that represents the <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> serialization configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'objet qui représente l'élément de configuration de la sérialisation <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.DateTimeSerializationSection" /> object that represents the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.DateTimeSerializationSection" /> qui représente l'élément de configuration.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that represents the section that contains configuration elements for the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'objet qui représente la section contenant les éléments de configuration de <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.SchemaImporterExtensionsSection" /> that represents the <see langword="schemaImporterExtenstion" /> element in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.SchemaImporterExtensionsSection" /> qui représente l'élément <see langword="schemaImporterExtenstion" /> du fichier de configuration.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that represents the configuration group for the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'objet qui représente le groupe de configurations pour <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" />.
